page.title: 06EASNEYE COLLEGE
page.content: Just outside Ware is the {All Nations {Christian College,}once the home of the buxton family.There are 150 mature students from 30 different countries throughout the world studying to be missionaries.Most students are at { {Easneye}on a two year course unless they have already had some experience of teaching Christianity.{Anne {Dereybekill} was once a P.E teacher. Six years ago while staying with a friend she was told by God to become a missionary.She came to {Easneye }to find out if it was the right thing to do.When she leaves the college later this year she hopes to go to India to teach Christianity.
